item.title: Repetitive reform: Doing more harm than good?
UAntwerp will support a pilot study to the usefulnes of biomarkers to examine unintended side-effects of repetitive reforms
item.description: “Inspired by advancements in neuroendocrinology, this funding aims at supporting a pilot study on the usefulness of hair cortisol concentration (HCC) analysis for understanding the effect of intense change sequences on civil servants.”
